<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4506</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Grammar – Present Tense</string>
            <string language="es">Gramática – Tiempo presente</string>
            <string language="ga">Gramadach - Aimsir Láithreach</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Grammatik? Gegenwart</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Grammaire ? Présent</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Gramática? Tempo Atual</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Grammatica? Presente</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γραμματική; Παρών χρόνος</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This lesson is a very enjoyable way  to revise the verbs and even to teach them for the first time. At this point the pupils only need the verb in the first person singular (i am, i get up).        </string>
            <string language="es">Esta lección ofrece una forma divertida de revisar los verbos e incluso enseñarlos por primera vez. En este momento los alumnos sólo necesitan el verbo en primera persona del singular (yo soy, yo me levanto).        </string>
            <string language="ga">Is éard atá sa cheacht seo ná bealach an-taitneamhach chun dul siar a dhéanamh ar bhriathra agus fiú chun iad a mhúineadh don chéad uair. Ní ag teastáil ó na daltaí ag an bpointe seo ach an briathar sa chéad phearsa uatha (tá mé, éirím).        </string>
          </description>
          <language>ga</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Irish</string>
            <string language="es">Irlandés</string>
            <string language="ga">Gaeilge</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Speaking</string>
            <string language="es">Idioma hablado. Plan de lección</string>
            <string language="ga">Labhairt</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Plean Ceachta</string>
            <string language="ga">Lesson Plan</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Lektion ist eine sehr erfreuliche Methode, 
die Verben zu verbessern und gleichmäßig, um sie zum ersten Mal zu 
unterrichten. An diesem Punkt benötigen die Pupillen nur das 
Verb in der ersten Personeigenheit (ich bin, ich aufstehe).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette leçon est une voie très agréable de 
mettre à jour les verbes et égal pour les enseigner pour la 
première fois. En ce moment les pupilles ont besoin seulement 
du verbe dans le premier singulier de personne (je suis, je me lève).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta lição é uma maneira muito agradável 
revisar os verbos e uniforme para ensiná-los para a primeira vez. 
Neste momento as pupilas necessitam somente o verbo no primeiro 
singular da pessoa (eu sou, mim me levanto).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa lezione è un modo molto divertente 
modificare i verbi e perfino per insegnarli per la prima volta. 
A questo punto le pupille hanno bisogno soltanto del verbo nel 
primo singolare della persona (sono, io mi alzo).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το μάθημα είναι ένας πολύ ευχάριστος τρόπος να
αναθεωρηθούν τα ρήματα και ακόμη και να διδαχθούν για πρώτη 
φορά. Σε αυτό το σημείο οι μαθητές χρειάζονται μόνο το 
ρήμα στον πρώτο ενικό αριθμό προσώπων (είμαι, σηκώνομαι).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Irisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sprechen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Plean Ceachta</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Irlandais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Parler</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Plean Ceachta</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Irish</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Discurso</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Plean Ceachta</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Irlandese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Parlare</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Plean Ceachta</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ιρλανδικά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ομιλία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Plean Ceachta</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
